name: TheAtlantic
text: "For people across a broad ideological terrain, Trumpism will be less an attractive political philosophy than a term of abuse," @PeterBeinart writes. "The best precedent is McCarthyism, which has become a synonym for hysterical intolerance." https://t.co/3tCUHyGudt

name: TheAtlantic
text: "I'm going to be the kind of congressperson where I’m going to be at rallies with the people, fighting for justice and being present," Jamaal Bowman, whom the Associated Press has said defeated incumbent Democrat Eliot Engel, told @IsaacDovere: https://t.co/4y06Hu2gfw

name: TheAtlantic
text: The grim effects of Trump’s wayward whims have turned Americans into a nation of armchair psychologists, struggling to understand the workings of one particular psyche, @megangarber writes: https://t.co/kjtvKWibC5

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Twitter—and companies like it—are essential to our national dialogue, to our economy, and to our democracy. We need to start treating them that way, and that means requiring them to do a better job on security and breaking them up," @schneierblog writes: https://t.co/FLWRNaNtSp

name: TheAtlantic
text: For all the existing vulnerabilities the coronavirus has exposed, it has also revealed how easily seemingly intractable problems can be fixed—with enough political will, writes @YasmeenSerhan: https://t.co/GQqOftThVX

name: TheAtlantic
text: A first-in-the-nation law in Colorado aimed at police accountability has activists celebrating and officers worrying, @russellberman reports: https://t.co/EI8y9QLd54

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Courage in the public square is very rarely about unearthing an epic wrong and seeking to right it; finding a pit of dastardliness and uncovering it for all to see," @EliotACohen writes: https://t.co/PXhDW1Gblp

name: TheAtlantic
text: Listen to @olgakhazan explain how nursing homes came to account for over 40% of U.S. coronavirus deaths: https://t.co/KurAQUWW9Q

name: TheAtlantic
text: Two of our writers discuss the fallout so far—and detail the scary consequences still to come. The latest Atlantic Daily: https://t.co/89AYndwc9e
